description.zh: 都市設計是一種整體性、全面性的思考，他包含了對都市內整體全般的活動記其所一存的實質環境安排，同時他也處理既有建成環境的成形及其與自然環境間的關係對應。並思考處身於其間的人們如何在社會與經濟的各種層面做出最適切的回應並具體呈現於空間裡。	故之，一個好的都市設計絕對不僅止於技術上的分析評估，他更關切於人們如何看待環境，如何面對環境思考，如何面對環境思考，與如何參與程式設計的成形。	這個專題將討論什麼是都市設計極其重要性，都市設計在現時處境下所面臨的挑戰，以及我們可以如何藉由都市設計創造一個可為適切的都市環境。
description.en: Urban Design should to be understood to apply to all scales of and types of urban activity and to be concerned about the physical arrangement and functioning of urban activities, the physical appearance of the built environment and its relationship to the natural environment, the way in which people experience it and the social and economic factors which influence its quality.	So achieving good urban design does not require that every decision maker becomes skilled in important design decision know what the people involved in important design decision know what to look for, the questions to ask, and have at least a rough idea of the criteria to consider.	This course will discuss urban design what is it and why is urban design important, what are the challenges, and how to setting our fundamental directions for achieving a more cohesive and satisfying environment.

notes: 四建四、職二建五、進二建五合開

description.zh: 本工程對基礎工程施工時容易產生的隆起、沙湧、上舉、液化、地下室上浮等災害介紹其產生之原因與案例，同時在時間許可下也介紹高層建築中常見的連續壁工程及逆打工程師公中應注意的要點
description.en: This course purpose to illustrate the cause and case for foundation construction failures and disasters, which includes Heaving, Quick Sand, Up-Lift, Liquefaction and Basement UP Lift, etc. If time is allowed, I will extra introduce which important to pay attention items for construction of Slurry Wall Engineering and Up-Down construction Method Engineering which often be used in High-Rise Architecture.

description.zh: 先修課程:負責教授同意自動控制概論，汽車自動變速簡介，液動基本原理，液體接合扭力變換器，行星齒輪與超速控制，自動閥控系統與換檔裝置，液壓油與液壓油之冷卻，電動自動變速簡介，各式變速箱舉例。
description.en: Introduction to Automatic Control, Introduction to AutomobileTransmission, Hydraulic Principle, Hydraulic Coupling, Planetary Gears, Automatic Transmission Valve System, Hydraulic Oil Cooling System, Introduction to Electrical Transmission System.

description.zh: 介紹汽機車上各控制系統之硬體及控制策略，包含引擎系統之空燃比、怠速、冷起動、爆震、廢氣，傳動系統之變速、傳動，煞車系統之ABS、TCS、SRS，懸吊系統之半主動及主動式懸吊，智慧型道路系統之頭燈、環境、巡航、跟隨、夜視等控制系統。
description.en: This course introduces hardware and control strategies used in each control systems in a vehicle.  These control systems include engine system (AF ratio, idle speed, cold start, knocking, exhaust), transmission system, brake system (ABS, TCS, SRS), suspension system (semi-active and active), intelligent transportation system (headlight, environment, cruise, following, night vision) etc..

The texts  include the reading and writing of topic sentence, paragraph development, and the introduction to various styles of composition with a view to reinforce sentences  variety and advanced grammatical ideas.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹冷凍工程，以及其設計，內容涵蓋如下：冷凍工程原理，冷凍系統之設備，各種冷凍系統之設計，冷凍負荷計算，冷媒管路之設計與計算，冷凍庫之設計。
description.en: This course introduces the refrigeration engineering and its system design; the contents cover the following topics: the principles of refrigeration engineering, the equipment and designs of different refrigeration systems, refrigeration load calculations, design and calculation of refrigerant piping, and refrigeration storage design.

description.zh: 先修課程：3002012或負責教授同意。介紹各種不同分析方法（如能量法及Castigliano定理）、破壞理論、材料選用、可靠度概念、軸及軸承、離合器及煞車器、傳動元件(如皮帶、鏈條、齒輪)、軸聯接器、飛輪、彈簧等。
description.en: Prerequisite: ME212 or Consent of Instructor Introduction to Analysis Methods (Energy method & Castigliano theorem), Failure Theory, Material Selection, Introduction to reliability, Shafts and Bearings, Clutches and Brakes, Power Transmission Elements (Belts, Chains, Gears), Couplings, Flywheels, and Springs.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。自動控制數學基礎、物理系統的數學模式、控制器的種類、時域分析、穩定性分析、根軌跡法、頻率領域的分析、控制系統的設計、Z 轉換、數位控制、電腦控制之介面及程式、現代控制理論與簡介。
description.en: Mathematical Foundation of Automatic Control, Mathematical Model of Physical System, Controller Type, Time-Domain Analysis, Stability Analysis, Root Locus Method, Frequency-Domain Analysis, Design of Control System, Z-Transform, Digital Control, Interface and Programming of Computer Control, Theory and Introduction of Modern Control.

description.zh: 本課程以提升學生英文能力，至全民英檢中級以上的程度為目標。教學內容以加強學生日常生活中，如：購物、旅遊、定餐等用語之溝通、運用、表達及閱讀寫作等能力為主。1. 94學年度起之大學部入學新生擬修習「英文實務」課程說明：學生修習「英文實務」課程，必須參加全民英檢中級初試， 其中「聽力 測驗」及「閱讀測驗」兩項成績合計達80分以上，始得修習此課程，修課學生請持「全民英檢中級初試成績單正本及影本至」教務處註冊組登錄。）2. 為考量同學因個人生涯規劃，若參加「全民英檢」以外的英語檢定考試，例如適用於全球職場英文能力統一標準之TOEIC測驗及教育部所規定採計之其他英檢考試等。其考試成績如對應符合CEF B1級（全民英檢中級）以上者，免修英文實務。
description.en: The goal of this course is to help students enhance their English proficiency superior to the Intermediate Level of General English Proficiency Test. A student who completes this course will be able to perform routine daily communication such as travel, shopping, ordering a meal, etc. and will have better understanding in reading and writing.

description.en: To train students have the abilities of independent thinking and judgment, develop the healthy personality and Humanities conservation, and keep the six fields of core curriculum in general education. this course will design a series of optional curriculum on Erudition & Refinement in each field, and develop students the broader sight and reach the spirit of the holistic education.

description.zh: 先修課程：3001052或負責教授同意。介紹 2D/3D CAD概論、實體模型系統、特徵式設計系統、曲面模型系統、CAD或CAE系統示範與實作。

description.en: Structure and design Fundamental element of craft, punching, principle and process of steaming cutting, principles of deformation, forming phenomena, design and manufacturing process of continuous stretching.

description.en: Introduction to laser machining device, laser cutting, laser welding, laser surface treatment and the safety items during laser machine operation.

description.zh: 薄膜材料科學，真空科學與技術，薄膜蒸鍍製程，放電、電漿、離子與表面作用，物理氣相沈積，化學氣相沈積，基材表面與薄膜成核，薄膜結構，薄膜性質測試，薄膜之相互擴散、反應與轉換，薄膜之機械性質。

Plasma and ion beam processing of thin films6. Chemical vapor deposition7. Substrate surfaces and thin film nucleation8. Film structure9. Characterization of thin films and surface10. Interdiffusion, reactions, and transformations in thin films11. Mechanical properties of thin films

description.zh: 本課程之內容包括:化學動力學及反應機構之基本理論,動力學數據之處理,各式理想反應器之設計,非理想狀態反應器之討論,單獨觸媒中非均勻相反應器之討論.
description.en: The subjects of the course include 1) fundamental theories of chemical kinetics and reaction mechanisms, 2) kinetic data collection and manipulation, 3) design equations for ideal reactors, 4) discussions on nonideal reactors, and 5) nonhomogeneous catalytic reactions.

description.zh: 此內容為化工程序的理論基礎，探討熱量與質量輸送之現象，以便應用於化工單元操作以及反應工程有關之計算與設計。
description.en: The course introduces the principles of the chemical process and discusses the heat and mass transport phenomena. And its application to the chemical unit operation and reaction engineering.

description.zh: 配合理論基礎、單元操作單元程序與程序控制，動態模擬之設備，瞭解實際工廠運作之情形。
description.en: A laboratory course practices the theories of the unit operation, process control and dynamic simulators.

description.zh: 選修介紹材料通性、分類與應用，並深入高分子生成之聚合反應、反應機構、反應動力學、熱力學、聚合物之材料構造、聚合方法、分子量之測定、分子量分佈以及一般檢測高分子特性之技術。
description.en: This course is concerned primarily with the synthesis, properties, and technology of synthetic polymers. Topics include polymerization, structure and properties, characterization , and properties of commercial polymers

description.zh: 本課程在闡述化學工業中以環保出發的催化劑之原理與應用。內容包括催化劑之化學結構、反應性、製備、物性鑑定、反應動力學分析。由催化循環、反應機制、催化劑結構、動力學來說明催化反應之原理。除此，並著重於介紹各催化反應應用類型：催化反應在溶液中、酵素、沸石孔洞及重要之工業固相觸媒。
description.en: This course explores the principles and applications of catalysts for the environmentally benign chemical processes. Topics include the concepts in chemical structure and reactivity of catalyst, catalyst preparation, catalyst characterization, and micro kinetic analysis of catalytic processes. The principles are illustrated with catalytic cycles, reaction mechanisms, catalyst structures, and kinetics. Additionally, we emphasis on applications of catalysis in solution, enzymes, solid and surfaces, within the molecular-scale cages of zeolites and sieves, the most important industrial catalysts.

description.zh: 本課程主旨在建立學生對預力構材的基本觀念。由對預力的認識、材料的要求，以主預力損失的瞭解及估算方式。從而由應力的觀點，討論撓曲斷面的分析及設計。最後再以施工及力學的須求方面探討預力鋼索佈置狀況。期使學生在修習後，能具備初步預力分析及設計之能力。
description.en: This course is aimed at establishing the basic concept of prestressed members to the students。It starts from introducing the high strength materials required by prestressed design，then the calculation of prestress losses are showns。The analysis and design of a flexural member are shown in a complete manner。

description.zh: 1.結構物劣化形態介紹2.目視檢測與非破生檢測3.現況評估與分析4.維修與補強設計
description.en: 1.Reterioration types of concrete structures 2.Visual and Non-destructive Inspection 3.Condition Evaluation and Analysis 4.Maintenance and Repair Design.

description.zh: 基礎水文及流力,基本水理(明渠水力),防洪工程,模型理論,作業研究,經濟分析,迴水演算,三峽工程論證.
description.en: Introduction,Hydraulic and hydraulic review,Flood migration,Model similitude,Operation research,Economical analysis,Gradually varied flow,Case study.

description.zh: 隨著人類對於工程技術的省思，以及環境倫理的變遷，兼顧生態、安全、景觀等面向生態工法逐漸受到重視。我國自2002年起，全力推動生態工法的落實及應用上的困難。有鑑於此，特開立「生態工法概論」，建立全盤性的了解，使土木工程能迎合時代的需求，提升相關智識水準。因此，將分別就基本精神、案例、應用範疇等議題進行探討。
description.en: This is intended as brief introduction to the subject of Ecological Engineering Methods(EEM), which is a whole new concept in the field of civil engineering. The Advantages of EEM is not only to satisfy the demand of safety(i.e. natural hazards control)but also that of protecting ecosystem and landscape aesthetic. In 2002, related government agencies try to pormote the application of EEM , and attempt to adopt this specific measure. However, the lack of basic understanding and knowledge has been the main reason why engineers are struggling in introducing EEM into reality. Therefore, including fundamental theories, cases study, and practical apects of application will be taught in this course. The optimal goal is to inspire students to learn more about new philosopgy and techniques in the world of civil engineering.

description.zh: 基礎地盤若是軟弱土壤(例軟粘土,泥炭土,鬆砂土填土等)所構成時,則無法安全承載其上面建築物結構物,土堤等之載重,並且受交通車輛,機械振動地震等之動力作用亦最容易發生剪力破壞,滑動破壤及過大沈陷等安全問題.因此,對於這些軟弱土壤之工程性質要加以改善的必要. 1.軟弱地盤之定義,種類與影響 2.軟弱地盤之調查目的及調查種類 3.軟弱地盤之調查方法與步驟 4.軟弱土壤性質之測定 5.軟弱地盤之改良方法(包括夯實工法,排水工法,預載重方法,動力壓 密工法,爆破工法,振動揚實工法,注入工法,石灰穩定工法及其他穩定工法).
description.en: Soil Improvement is very important for embankments and foundations in construction engineering.This course deals with the following subjects:1.definition of soft ground 2.types of soft soil.3.investigation methods of soft soils. 4.improvement methods of soft ground(include compaction method,dewatering method,preloading method,dynamic consolidation method,vibrofloation method,injection method and soil-lime stabilization method.)

name.zh: 智慧型行動電話原理與實務設計
name.en: Smart Mobile Phone Principle and Practical Design

description.zh: 1.2G~4G通訊系統介紹 2.行動電話傳輸介面3.元件表面黏著技術4.發光二極體應用與電路設計5.電激發光應用與電路設計6.靜電原理特性與保護元件7.積體電路元件包裝與記憶體元件介紹8.無線通訊網路 9.智慧型行動電話生產流程與測試流程10.智慧型行動電話研發測試項目
description.en: 1. 2G~4G Telecommunication Systems Introduction 2. Transmission interface of Mobile Phone 3. Surface Mount Technology of component 4. Light Emitting Diode application and circuit design 5. Electro Luminescent application and circuit design 6. Electrostatic Discharge Characteristic and protection component 7.Integrated Circuit component package and Memory component Introduction 8. Wireless Communication network 9. Smart Mobile Phone Production Process and Test Process 10. Smart Mobile Phone Research Test Item

description.zh: 介紹嵌入式計算系統設計原理,使學生瞭解如何使用計算機軟、硬體為元件來設計嵌入式計算系統。1.嵌入式計算系統簡介2.指令集3.中央處理器4.嵌入式計算平台5.程式設計與分析6.程序與作業系統7.硬體加速器8.網路與分散式嵌入式系統9.系統設計方法
description.en: The objective of this course is to develop a comprehensive understanding of the basic concepts involving the design, development and deployment of embedded computing systems, using computing software and hardware as components. The course outline is as follows.1.An introduction to Embedded Computing System2.Instruction Sets3.CPUs4.The Embedded Computing Platform5.Program Design and Analysis6.Processes and Operating Systems7.Hardware Accelerators8.Networks and Distributed Embedded Systems9.System Design Techniques

description.zh: 本課程在二技為2學分。本課程係針對大學生授課標準研擬有關個人及企業投資及財務之管理。本課程之目的在使學生瞭解如何使相關之投資獲得良好報酬，介紹企業財務結構。企業資金分配情形。企業如何籌措資金及相關財務理論之應用。本課程研究內容包括：財務市場結構、利息因子、財務規畫及分析、股票、債券、租借問題、資金預算分配及風險性、長期借貸、有價證券等。
description.en: This course includes modern theory of business finance with emphasis on analytical and quantitative skills, treatment of firm's investment financing, dividend decisions in a valuation framework, survey of related empirical work, net present value, portfolio theory, capital asset pricing model, efficient capital markets, option theory, and effect of inflation.

description.zh: 探討如何規畫、組織、用人、領導及控制各種資源包括人員、設備、材料、資金，期能及時在容許預算下完成特定專案。
description.en: This course discovers the planning, organization, employment, leading and control of resources including person, facility, materials, and capital in order to complete the project under the pre-specified time and cost.

description.zh: 本課程著重實務應用，內容將涵蓋現場改的原則與基本技術，生產流程的改善技術，現場庫存與交其改善的技術，設施佈置改善技術；降低成本的技術，目視管理的改善技術，生產效率改善技術，生產系統的改善技術等。
description.en: This course will focus on the topic of On-Job Improvement principle, production flow improvement, inventory control, facility planning, cost reduction, efficiency and production system improvement etc.

description.zh: 介紹設施規劃，合理化的觀念、原理、方法步驟，舊規劃合理化的理由、重要性、方法及步驟。設施搬運系統及位置的遴選、及其考慮因素及決定方法
description.en: This course introduces the concepts, theories, and approaches of facilities planning.  Material handling and site selection are also included.

description.zh: 本課程在二技為2學分。人因工程旨在研究調查人類的能力、限制、行為和其他特性等知識，而應用於工具、設備、系統、任務、工作和環境等的設計，以提高人類生活品質及生產力。所探討的內容可歸納如下：人因工程的研究方法、人體設計、人員的感覺歷程、人員的資訊處理、人員的體力活動、人機介面設計、作業環境、安全與衛生等。
description.en: Human factors is dedicated to discover and survey human beings' capability, limit, behavior and other futures.  And then apply it to the design of tools, facilities, systems, works and environments in order to enhance the quality of life and productivity.  The course includes research approaches, physical design, human being's feeling process and information process, human/machine interface, operating environments, and safety.

description.zh: 使學生瞭解全面品質管理的意義、理念、重要性、範圍、實施條件、方法、品管工具，品管工具以外的管理工具、方法，實施全面品管遭遇到的問題，實施全面品質管理的預期成效。
description.en: This course introduces the meaning, theories, importance, scope, implementation constraints, methods, quality control tools of TQM.  Besides, the other management tools and approaches are also included.  The course also contains the possible problems and expected effective as implementing.

description.zh: 本課程分三年（六學期）教授，各學年課程教授內容如下：第一學年----主要在教導學生對美學基本素養、空間的體驗及空間構成演練，使具備建築設計之基本能力與知識，其主要授課要點如下：一.基本設計訓練及空間的體驗：1.設計基本原理的認識與操作。2.空間經驗的掌握與表達。二、空間的構成：1.基本元素的應用--線、版、體。2.比例、尺度、材質與構造的訓練。3.開口及光影的表現。4.空間的界定與串連。三、空間與造型：1.空間與造型的關係。2.量體與空間、造型。3.結構概念與空間、造型。四、機能與組織：1.行為模式分析。2.機能與動線安排。3.空間的組織。第二學年----主要在教導學生探討空間組織、造型與行為模式等使學生具備整合建築設計相關知識及操作之能力，其主要授課要點如下：1.在範圍上--以各種使用性質的單棟建築為主題。2.在設計內容上--進一步探討空間組織、造型、行為特性及模式。3.在實質因素上--訓練對基地實質環境的認識及掌握，並著重材料、構造、設備、結構等系統的結合。4.在實務人才的養成上--具備整合建築設計相關專業知識及操作的能力。第三學年----主要在教導學生對環境或都市之認知，並使其具備細部設計以至整體建築設計及監造之能力，以銜接未來之實
description.en: This course is organized, as a three-year's program that is arranged around a pattern of six semesters. The modular teaching structure is:1. First year - An introduction to basic design problem solving : concepts of point, line, plane, and space organization : principles of unity/variety ,order ,balance , proportion ,scale , etc.; orthographic projection and axonometrics ; pattern diagramming ; and basic design consequences of human activity. Studio introduction to architectural design problem solving; concepts of architectural aesthetic principles; value drawing techniques; model building; anthropometrics ; and human gathering and circulation patterns. Investigations of visual structures and their order , and exercises to develop ability to communicate about form and space. Explorations of two-dimensional and three-dimensional design through manipulation of the design elements in association with the design principles. Emphasis on materials , techniques , and color/shape relationshi

notes: 職二建四、進二建四合開

description.zh: 本課程主要在論述以建築規劃設計者之立場如何利用建築設備系統控制建築物理環境影響因子，以及其與建築物銜接介面之統合關係。本課程為第二階段之系列課程，其內容包括：1. 建築防火避難與消防設備2. 給排水衛生化糞設備3. 升降機設備系統4. 智慧型建築概論5. 垃圾處理設備6.物理環境衝擊影響評估與對策
description.en: This course mainly discuss issues about architecture planning how a designer uses architecture equipment system to control architecture physical Environmental Impact, and its integrate relation with Building's connecting medium.This course is the second step of a series course, its content including:1. Architecture Fire Safety. Fire Escape and Fire Fighting Equipment2. Plumbing Equipment3. Elevator Equipment4. Introduction about Intelligent Building5. Refuse Treatment Equipment6. Physical Environmental Impact Assessment and Resolution.

notes: 職二建四、進二建四合開

description.zh: 1.建築法規體系概述、2.中央法規標準法、3.建築法架構解說、4.建築師法及營造業管理規則、5.省市建築管理規則、6.省市畸零地使用規則、7.面臨現有巷道申請建築原則、8.都市計劃法系簡介及鄉關法規介紹、9.建築技術規則及台北市土地使用分區管制規則、10. 研定(修)中之建築法規介紹。
description.en: 1.	Introduction to the Building Law and Regulation System2.	Building Code3.	Construction Code4.	Urban planning Code5.	Zoning Code6.	Analysis on New Directions of the Codes

notes: 職二建四、進二建四合開

name.en: Special Issues of Computer-Aided Architectural Design (II)

description.zh: 本課程主要目標包括以下各方面：1.介紹與瞭解電腦繪圖在環境規劃設計上的應用方法與理論。2.具備將設計作品以數化處理與數位表達的技術與能力。3.學習建築設計三度空間模擬的動畫。4.自動化設計與輔助繪圖思考。授課內容主題包括：建築專業輔助繪圖設計軟體的介紹應用，包括平面繪圖表現，3D模型設計表現，建築專業設計3D動畫模擬處理，自動化繪圖與自動化設計理論介紹，空間資訊系統理論與方法，設計專案的競圖表現與應用。
description.en: The goal of this class:1.We introduce theory of computer-aided architectural design and we apply the method to environmental planning & design.2.We learn how to presentation architectural design by digital method, tools and technology.3.We learn how to simulate architectural design by animation with 3D spatial data model.4.We introduce theory about automatic architectural design and design thinking.The contents of this class is included about: introduction and application of professional soft of computer-aided architectural design, 2D's presentation of computer-aided architectural de

notes: 職二建四、進二建四合開

description.zh: 本課程主要為介紹與歷史建築與古蹟之保存與再利用相關的觀念、理論、技術與發展概況，授課採講演方式。
description.en: This module introduces primarily the involved concept, theory, technique and the general conditions of its development. Class will be conducted by lecturing.

notes: 職二建四、進二建四合開

name.en: Introduction of the Architecture for the aged

description.zh: 1.研討老人身心特性與生活需求特徵。2.介紹老人居住設施種類與空間機能。3.了解老人社區活動與外出行動模式。
description.en: 1.To study and discuss the attributions of ageds' mental and   body and the characteristics of their live needs2.To introduce the types of the ageds' inhabitation   facilities and their space and functions.3.To understand the ageds' social activities and their outdoor behaviors' moods

notes: 職二建四、進二建四合開

description.zh: 本課程採用分組教學，以1：5的師生比例就教師之專長指導學生在建築實務工作之各領域進行資料搜集，現場觀摩，對特定之課題提出報告，訓練學生深入的接觸並膫解實際的工作，以培養學生發掘問題，解決問題之執業能力。
description.en: There are teaching groups for this course, each teacher by his particular research field direct five students in special topics on Architecture practice for information collecting, site studying, and report writing, The purpose is training students to come into conduct with reality Architecture working. Then, footer students professional ability to find problems, and resolve there problems in working field.

notes: 職二建四、進二建四合開

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹生產業與服務業中之作業管理。其中包含預測、產品與服務設計、產能規劃、地點選擇規劃分析、存貨管理、及時系統與供應鏈管理、專案管理、及品質管理。
description.en: The purpose of the course is to introduction operation management in industry and service. It includes forecasting, product and service design, capacity planning, location selection and analysis planning, inventory management, just-in-time and supply chain management, project management, and quality management.

description.zh: 本課程在使學生瞭解策略管理的意義及其演進, 如何建立公司策略以增加之競爭力。課程主要內容包括：1.策略管理的意義, 2.企業內外在環境分析, 3.策略制定, 4.策略執行與評估, 5.事業階層策略, 6.公司策略, 7.購併。
description.en: The objective of the course is to establish a set of frameworks for the formulation and implementation of strategy. Topics of the course include SWOT, strategy formulation, strategy implementation, business-level strategy, corporate-level strategy, and merger & acquisition.

description.zh: 今日快速變遷的工商社會環境，使個人的工作和企業的生存都遭受莫大的危機。自由意識與人權觀念的高漲亦製造出許多個人與組織（企業或政府）之間的衝突。然而如果經由適當的管理和處理得宜，危機可以變為轉機，衝突的化解可以促進互信和瞭解。本課程首先介紹學生認識危機與衝突，發生的背景，分析危機與衝突的因素和癥結，教導學生處理危機與化解衝突的技巧與智識，並以實例介紹這些技巧的運用。
description.en: The fast changing society today has created a profound crisis to the jobs of an individual and to the survival of a business. The awareness of freedom and the concept of human rights have also created the conflicts between individuals and the organization (business or government). However, if managed properly, one can turn crisis into opportunity. The resolution of conflict can improve the mutual understanding. This course will introduce the students to recognize the background of crisis and conflict, analyze their key problems, teaches students the techniques and knowledge to manage crisis and to resolve conflict. These techniques will be illustrated with real world cases.

notes: 與進二管四合開／職二管四最高選課人數上限25人

description.zh: 本課程適用於一般大專之決策分析課程。其目的在說明決策理論之基本觀念，及其在真實世界裡相關決策問題之分析。本課程授課主題包括：不考慮機率之決策問題、與機率有關之決策問題、獲取額外資訊之決策分析、效益分析、遊戲理論。相關之授課內容包括：機率分配、期望值方法、貝氏分析、完全資訊與額外資訊之期望值。
description.en: This is an undergraduate course dealing with decision-making and analysis. The objective of this course is to interpret the basic Concepts of decision theory and its applications on some real world decision analysis problems. The main topics of this course include decision making without probability, decision making with probability, decision analysis with additional information, utility theory, game theory. The related studies includes probability distribution, expected value approach, Bayesian analysis, expected value of perfect information and sample information

description.zh: 人際關係是探討對自我的了解及對人的認知，包括性格、態度、魅力、溝通、壓力、挫折和情緒等重要課題的處理；幫助同學學習與各種不同品味、信念、立場與生活方式的人作有效率的溝通，開放的表達出自己的感覺與想法，以建立良好的合作關係，從而開發潛能、爭取更好的發展機會。溝通是人際關係中重要的手段，本課程提供學生對溝通知識的了解，並熟悉溝通的實務運用。課程重心涵蓋溝通的本質與觀念性架構，溝通的理論與模型，溝通的規劃、執行與控制，溝通的策略與技能。
description.en: Interpersonal Relationship is to discuss about self-understanding and perception of other people, including how to handle key issues related to character, attitude, attractiveness, communication, pressure, frustration and emotion. It helps students to learn effective communication, open their minds to express personal feeling and thought, and try to communicate with other people having different tastes, convictions, standpoints and ways of living so as to establish a harmonic and cooperative relationship and develop personal potential and strive for better opportunity of development. The course discuss about the communication issue from business manager. It introduces the concepts of communication and the practice about communication. The core of the course include the knowledge of communication and structure、theory and models.

description.zh: 本課程藉由探討組織決策與團隊領導之內容，分析組織設計之相關因素，並討論當代組織最新的設計與發展趨勢，俾使同學結合組織設計及團隊領導理論，利用個案討論增強理論之理解與活用，進而培養學生管理組織與領導之能力。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to integrate the most resent thinking about organization design and leadership with classic and traditional ideas and theories.

description.zh: 以管理經理的角色，經營組織運作系統，包括代理權與機構間的結合，課程包含1.以策略態勢，瞭解和定義零售和批發商概念。2.學習通路管理和行銷組合。3.學習通路規劃、統合和組織。4.學習通路評估與管理。
description.en: This course includes:1. Important concepts in retailing and wholesaling are defined and explained from a strategic perspective; 2.Study channel management and the marketing mix; 3.Study channel planning, coordination and organization; 4. Study channel assessment and control.

name.zh: 進階英文閱讀與聽講練習

description.zh: 教導學生閱讀囊括全球議題的文章，並藉由文章的內容作技巧的訓練，字彙的建構，語言的解析，及思維的啟發。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。
description.en: The course provides students with explicit skills-based instruction in learning how to process, and decipher the readings that serve as springboards for reading skills development, vocabulary building, language analysis, and thought-provoking discussions. The readings include a variety of viewpoints on global topics centered around social issues, the environment, psychology, business, and technology.  Extension activities are designed to encourage students to go beyond the reading text, and to put what they acquire from the readings into listening, speaking and writing practices.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。物質熱力學特性、改變能量形式之基本原理、熱力學第一及第二定律、可逆性與可用性、動力循環、冷凍循環、混合氣、化學反應。
description.en: Prerequisite: Consent of InstructorThermodynamic Properties of Substance, Energy Forms, The First Law Thermodynamics, The Second Law of Thermodynamics, Irreversibility & Availability, Power Cycle, Refrigeration Systems, Mixtures, and Chemical Reactions.

name.zh: 機械工程概論及實驗(二)

description.zh: (A)熱工實驗：能量轉換、熱之傳遞、對流及輻射、熱交換器、燃燒及燃料等之實驗。(B) 流力實驗：雷諾數實驗、管路摩擦實驗(損失係數)、管路能量損失實驗(90°彎管、小半徑彎管、大半徑彎管、突擴、突縮)、文氏管流量實驗、孔口板流量實驗、壓力量測實驗、堰流量實驗、pump性能曲線實驗、壓力中心實驗、風洞實驗(升力、阻力係數)。
description.en: (A) Thermal Lab. Thermal experiments include energy transformation, heat conduction, convection, and radiation, heat exchanger, combustion, etc. (B) Fluid Mechanics Lab. Reynolds’s Number test, Pipe friction test (loss coefficient), Pipe energy loss test (90°miter, elbow, sudden enlargement and contraction), Venturi meter flow measurement, Orifice flow measurement, Pressure measurement, Wear flow measurement, Pump performance test, Pressure center test, Wind tunnel experiments (lift and drag coefficient).

description.zh: 講授各種電機機械的工作原理及特性，內容包含：磁路分析、變壓器、旋轉電機原理、直流機、多相感應馬達、單相感應馬達、同步機、伺服及步進馬達。
description.en: To teach the principles and characteristics of electrical machinery, this course includes the subjects of analysis of magnetic circuits, transformers, principles of rotating electric machinery, direct-current machines, multiple-phase induction motors, single-phase induction motors, synchronous machines, servo and step motors.

description.zh: 以C語言為主的計算機應用程式設計，得包含：人機界面程式、即時多工程式、輸出入界面程式、多媒體程式、通訊及網路程式。
description.en: Computer programming using C language: programming of human-machine interface, real-time multi-task programming, input/output interface programming, multimedia programming, communicational and network programming.

description.zh: 氣體動力工程概論、壓縮氣體特性、空氣的調理與控制、空氣動力元件和控制迴路、順序控制器氣壓控制之應用、液壓工程基本原理、液壓流體之特性與調理、液壓動力源，致動器，控制元件及迴路,傳送,配管, 維護與安全。
description.en: Introduction of Pneumatic, Pneumatic elements Instruction, Electrical Parts for Pneumatic Control, Pneumatic Basic control circuit, Pneumatic Application control Circuit, Introduction of Hydraulic, Hydraulic control Element Instruction, Electrical Parts for Hydraulic Control, Hydraulic Basic Control Circuit, Hydraulic Application Control Circuit, and Pneumatic and Hydraulic Trouble Shooting.

name.zh: 進階英文閱讀與聽講練習

description.zh: 教導學生閱讀囊括全球議題的文章，並藉由文章的內容作技巧的訓練，字彙的建構，語言的解析，及思維的啟發。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。
description.en: The course provides students with explicit skills-based instruction in learning how to process, and decipher the readings that serve as springboards for reading skills development, vocabulary building, language analysis, and thought-provoking discussions. The readings include a variety of viewpoints on global topics centered around social issues, the environment, psychology, business, and technology.  Extension activities are designed to encourage students to go beyond the reading text, and to put what they acquire from the readings into listening, speaking and writing practices.

description.zh: 提供本校四技學生在本行以外，對其他領域的認識，以彌補其只鑽研專業課程的偏頗，訓練學生整合知識，使不致在知識爆炸的時代中迷失，促進各種專材的溝通，培養共識；培育人文素養，啟發人文關懷，使具有完整的人生觀。
description.en: This course offers a good opportunity for four-year college students in this university to have an easier access to a completely different field of knowledge, in the hope that  students can add their individual professional knowledge and broaden their minds. The students will be furnished with integrated knowledge, discovering a better way towards professional communication, developing more common sense and never losing themselves in this information-explosive age. With a solid basis on humanity and liberal ideology, they are sure to find a more complete picture of human life.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。介紹運轉中的機械系統其各部零件在運動必須遵守的準則及力在零件間的傳遞。範例含連桿組、凸輪、齒輪、純滾動系統、鏈輪、皮帶、滾筒式傳動組等的介紹。
description.en: Prerequisite: Consent of InstructorIntroduction of the principles that all the members of a mechanical system have to obey in motion as well as the forces transmitted between the members. Examples include linkages, cams, gears, pure rolling systems, chain drives, belt drives, friction drives, etc.

description.en: Prerequisite: Consent of InstructorThermodynamic Properties of Substance, Energy Forms, The First Law Thermodynamics, The Second Law of Thermodynamics, Irreversibility & Availability, Power Cycle, Refrigeration Systems, Mixtures, and Chemical Reactions.

description.en: Force and Acceleration, Kinematics of a particle, Kinetics of a particle, Work and Energy, Impulse and Momentum, Kinematics of a Rigid Body, Kinetics of a Rigid Body.

description.zh: 機率空間；組合分析；隨機變數；期望值與慣矩；聯合分佈隨機變數；慣矩母函數及特徵函數；大數法則及中央極限定理；隨機漫步及帕森程序。
description.en: Course Title:Probability and Statistics Description:This course is designed for students to get concepts and methods of Probability and Statistics. The main purpose of this course is establishment of the foundations of industrial management, quality control, and industrial economics.

description.zh: 基本儀器介紹；電子零件之認識；二極體電路（特性）；運算放大器；電晶體電路（特性）；A/D ，D/A 轉換器；類比乘法器。運算放大器應用；線性電壓調整器；電壓參考及電流源；電壓比較器；電壓控制振盪器；鎖相迴路；頻率－電壓轉換器；類比－數位轉換器；數位－類比轉換器；特殊裝置語言合成電路。
description.en: Course Title:Electronics and Electronics Lab.Description:The properties of semiconductor and fabrication of a PNdiode and BJT, and their characteristics are explained. Part 2concentrates on analog circuit and system. Method of biasing adiscrete BJT or EET are given, and stability of the operating point isdiscussed. The small-signal model for each device is abstained and usedto calculate the performance of low frequency single stage andcascaded amplifiers. The feedback concepts of AMP. OP AMP, itscharacteristics and applications are described.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹工程上、物理上系統解析的相關數學工具，內容包括五大項：一 常微分方程式：一階，二階，及高階常微分方程，拉譜拉斯轉換，   特殊函數。二 向量幾何與分析：矩陣行列式及特徵問題。三 傅立葉級數，積分及轉換。四 偏微分方程及邊界值問題。五 複變分析及映射轉換。
description.en: This course intends to inbtroduce the mathematical principles and practices that today's engineers need to know. The course contents are 1. Ordinary Differential Eqs: 1st order, 2nd order and higher    order ODEs. Laplace transform, special function.2. Vector Algebra and Vector Analysis: Matrixs and    Determinants, Eigenvalve problems.3. Fourier Series, Integral and Transforms.4. Partial Differential Equations and Boundary Value    Problems.5. Complex Analysis: complex Integration, conformal mapping    and Applications.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 本課程以民主、法治課程為核心，重在強化公民的素養，增進政治體制及法律運作實務等之相關課程。
description.en: Democracy and nomocracy are the core curriculum, focusing on enhancing the quality of citizens and promoting the related courses in  the political system, the operation of the law practices and so on.

description.zh: 介紹電子零組件之組成，特性以及其應用，使學生具有實用電路之分析模擬與設計應用之能力，內容涵蓋：1.半導体物理，2.基本主動元件(二極体，雙極性電晶体，場效電晶体)，3.放大器電路，4.邏輯(數位)電路，5.積体電路。
description.en: 1.Semiconductor physics2.Diode 3.Bipolar Junction transistor4.Field-efferct 5.Operatonal amplifier6.Digital logic circuit7.Integrated circuit

description.zh: (1)半導體二極體特性曲線; (2)半導體二極體之應用:整流器,濾波器,剪波器,箝位器,倍壓器; (3)發光二極體驅動電路; (4)齊納二極體穩壓電路; (5)雙極接合面電晶體之辨別與參數量測; (6)雙極接合面電晶體輸入及輸出特性曲線; (7)雙極接合面電晶體直流偏壓電路; (8)共射極放大電路; (9)射極隨耦電路; (10)共基極定電流源電路; (11)場效電晶體之辨別與參數量測; (12)場效電晶體轉移及輸出特性曲線; (13)場效電晶體直流偏壓電路; (14)場效電晶體放大電路; (15)整流及濾波電路; (16)偏壓分析與設計; (17)基本放大器(共射，共基，共集模式，共源，共汲，共閘等); (18)串級放大器; (19)差動放大器。
description.en: (1)The characteristic curve of PN diode; (2)The applications of PN diode : Rectifier, Filter, Clipper, Clamper, and Voltage-doubler; (3)Light Emitting Diode drivers; (4)Zener diode for voltage regulation; (5)The identification of BJT's leads and the measurement of b parameter; (6)The input and output characteristic curves of BJTs; (7)DC biasing circuits for BJTs; (8)Common-Emitter(CE) amplifiers; (9)Emitter-follower(EF) circuits; (10)Common-Base(CB) constant current sources; (11)The identification of FET's leads and the measurement of device parameters; (12)The transfer and output characteristic curves of FETs; (13)DC biasing circuits for FETs; (14)The amplifying circuits of FETs; (15)Retifier circuit and Filter; (16)Bias analysis and design; (17)Common Emitter amplifier, Common base amplifier, Common collector amplifier; (18)Differential amplifier.

description.zh: 瞭解工程系統中常用數學之原理及應用，內容包含：1.常微分方程式之特殊解法，2.傅立葉(Fourier)級數及轉換，3.矩陣代數，4.偏微分方程式，5.數值方法，6.複變函數。
description.en: 1.Special functions for solving ordinary differential   equetions2.Fourier seriesand transformation3.Matrix and linear algebra4.Partial differential equations5.Numerical methods6.Complex variables

description.zh: １.組合分析２.機率理論３.隨機變數４.隨機變數函數５.機率分佈６.期望值性質７.樣本分佈８.假設檢定９.線性迴歸分析１０.變異數分析
description.en: 1.Combinatonal Analysis2.Pribability Theory3.Random Variables4.Functions of Random variables5.Probability Distribution 6.Properties of Expectation  7.Sampling Distribution 8.Tests of Hypotheses9.Linear Regression Analysis10.Analysis of Variance

description.zh: 瞭解程式語言所常用之各種資結構，１.抽象資料類別及運算複雜度之概念，２.靜態結構及其儲存法，３.遞迴、堆疊、前序、中序、後序運算式，４.佇列，５.串列、鏈結串列，６.樹、二元樹、平衡樹、堆積，７.圖形，８.排序，９.搜尋、雜湊。
description.en: This course is mainly aimed at introducing the data  structures commonly used in programming languages, including: (1) the concept of ADT (abstract data type) and computational complexity, (2) static structures and their storage representations , (3) recursion, stacks, and prefix, infix, and posfix expressions, (4) queues, (5) lists and linked lists, (6) trees, binary trees, height balanced trees, and heaps,  (7) graphs, (8) soring, and (9) searching and hashing.

description.zh: 1.電路元件2.電路特性3.網路方程式4.穩態分析及頻率響應5.網路函數：極點及零點6.雙埠網路分析7.傅利葉及拉普拉斯轉換
description.en: 1.Circuit components2.Circuit characteristics3.Network equations4.Steady state analysis and frequency response5.Network Functions: poles and zeros6.Two-port network analysis7.Fourier and laplace transform

description.en: The purpose of this course is to train the students who can be familiar with the statistics approaches and theories. Besides, they will be able to employ the collected data to analyze the unknown environments. The course includes probability theory, testing, regression analysis and variance analysis.

description.zh: 其主要是建立系統化的服務系統設計與服務作業管理方式，其內容：服務業本質的瞭解、服務設計、服務系統規劃、服務廠址選擇、服務場所佈置、服務程序設計、服務自動化及電腦化、服務作業管理人員管理、儀器設備管理、服務存貨管理、服務等候線管理、服務績效管理等。
description.en: This course mainly introduces the development, design and management of service systems. description.zh: 介紹資料庫系統之基本概念，熟悉基本指令及操作方法，使之能輕易建立資料檔案，並可對其資料進行擷取、添加、刪除、修改、編輯、排序、建立索引及產生標準報表列印等，且開發一套簡易應用軟體。
description.en: This course introduces the basic concepts of database system.  The students can understand the operation process in order to develop the data file.  In addition, the retrieval, add, delete, modify, edit and sorting of data files are also provided.  Finally, the students can develop a DBMS for themselves.

description.zh: 本課程在幫助此課程學習者能夠應用孼費的軟體和網路服務，製作一個基本的商業網站， 以推廣公司業務。
description.en: This course will teach the students tolearn how to built up a commercial website .

description.en: The course provides students with explicit skills-based instruction in learning how to process, and decipher the readings that serve as springboards for reading skills development, vocabulary building, language analysis, and thought-provoking discussions. The readings include a variety of viewpoints on global topics centered around social issues, the environment, psychology, business, and technology.  Extension activities are designed to encourage students to go beyond the reading text, and to put what they acquire from the readings into listening, speaking and writing practices.

description.en: Accordingly, the services provided by engineers require honesty, impartiality, fairness, and equity and must be dedicated to protection of the public health, safety and welfare. Engineers must perform under a standard of professional behavior that require adherence to the highest principles of ethical conduct. This course offers (1).Description of engineering ethics (2).Conflict and selection (3).Rule and explanation (4).Case study for student studied.

description.zh: 本門課藉由濕空氣線圖討論空氣調節之過程，分析人體舒適與空氣品質之需求，及各種空調設備系統之設計。本門課在空調負荷計算原理與方法涵蓋輻射熱、熱傳導及熱儲存效應等之分析，系統設計包括送風與送水系統之計算與設計，及室內送風分佈之理論與設計。
description.en: Air-conditioning processes are discussed by using psychrometric charts. Thermal comfort and indoor air quality requirements are presented. Design of air-conditioning equipment and systems are introduced. Air-conditioning load analysis includes radiation, transfer, and heat storage effects. System design includes design and calculation air and water moving systems. Air distribution principles and design are also covered.

description.zh: 本科目將由不可壓縮流體在各種流動環境所產生之流體分子流動現象之認識，進而利用各種有關因次群，熟習包含可壓縮流體在內之實際應用上所必須具備之基礎方法；如雷諾數．伯努力方程式等。利用流利基礎分析，流體機械之流場與動力，及管路內流場與壓力之變化。
description.en: Introduction to flow phenomena of incompressible flow, discussion on the dimensionless groups and their applicants, derive the conservation equations such as the Bernoulli equation, using fluid mechanics to analyze the field and the dynamics of fluid machinery, pipe and duct flow are also discuss.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹工程上、物理上系統解析的相關數學工具，內容包括：1. 向量幾何與分析：矩陣行列式及特徵問題。2. 傅立葉級數，積分及轉換。3. 偏微分方程及邊界值問題。
description.en: This course intends to introduce the mathematical principles and practices that today's engineers need to know. The course contents are 1. Vector Algebra and Vector Analysis: Matrices and Determinants, Eigenvalue problems. 2. Fourier Series, Integral and Transforms. 3. Partial Differential Equations and Boundary Value Problems.

Since the development of skin science, the safety and effectiveness of cosmetics were be concerned. According to this reason, the research of cosmetics needs to be studied deeply.

name.en: Chemistry of Hair Care Products and Ingredients

description.zh: 本課程將說明毛髮與化妝品之關係並針對市面上之髮妝品做解析，加強高分子材料科學知識之應用，最後針對目前流行的髮妝品：去頭皮屑洗髮乳/精/皂、潤髮乳、護髮素(乳)、定型液、髮油、髮蠟及髮膏等作深入之介紹。授課內容涵蓋毛髮的基礎知識以及瞭解各種傷害、頭髮與染燙髮的化學作用機制；毛髮保養劑的種類和特徵；染髮科學及染髮劑的化學組成；燙髮科學及燙髮劑的化學組成；美髮造型科學及造型劑的化學組成；不同消費者特性所需調配髮妝品之原料及功能；瞭解含天然成分髮妝品之綠色概念；髮妝品的安全與衛生管裡法規等。
description.en: This course is designed for undergraduate students to learn about the fundamentals of hair science, with emphasis on the knowledge of polymer material science applied to various chemical formulations of hair care products such as anti-dandruff shampoo, soaps, conditioners, fixatives, oils, waxes, and creams all available in the market. Students are provided with perspective topics including basic behaviors of hair growth and damage; chemical mechanisms by hair treatments such as color dyeing and bleaching; interactions of hair with shampoo and conditioner ingredients; green chemistry involved in compositions of natural products; regulations of safety and hygiene of hair care products.

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹界面活性劑之基本原理、合成及其界面現象，並講解界面活性劑在工業上之應用。
description.en: The course introduces the fundamental theory of interfacialagents and their synthesis mechanisms.  Applications of interacial agents in the industry will also be discussed.

description.zh: 本程主要教授學生熟悉：(1)結構之穩定與靜定性、(2)靜定結構之分析、(3)梁之剪力、彎矩圖、(4)影響線與移動力、(5)結構之彈性變形、(6)靜不定結構分析─諧合變位法、(7)傾角變位法及彎矩分配法。
description.en: Fundamental theory of statically determinate and indeterminate structures;analysis of determinate and indeterminate beams and frames by force and displacement methods;study of influence lines.

description.zh: 課程內容包含：(1)緒論、(2)運輸系統規劃、(3)公路工程概述、(4)交通工程概述、(5)鐵路工程概述、(6)航空工程概述、(7)港灣工程概述。
description.en: Integrated transportation systems from the standpoint of assembly,haul,and distribution means.Analysis of transportequipment and traveled way.Power requirements,speed, stopping,capacity,economics,route location.Future technological developments and innovations.

description.zh: 本課程介紹鋼筋混凝土構材受到軸向力、彎曲力矩、剪力、扭轉力矩及握裹力之分析，並依據鋼筋混凝土設計規範之規定，將設計理論使用於梁、版、柱、基礎等土木構造物之實務設計上。本課程除授於鋼筋混凝土之基本力學原理及實務設計與施工規定外，並建立鋼筋混凝土結構之正確設計理念，培養對鋼筋混凝土構造之分析與設計能力。主要授課內容如下:.鋼筋混凝土材料性質.設計載重與設計規範.梁之撓曲設計與剪力設計.鋼筋之續接、彎起或截斷及彎矩容量圖.鋼筋混凝土柱分析與設計.版之係數設計法、直接設計法及版之降伏線理論.基礎設計.鋼筋混凝土梁柱之耐震設計
description.en: The behaviors of reinforced concrete members subject to the axial force, bending moment and shear are introduced in this course. The design codes and practical design examples of beam, column, slab and foundation are also introduced. The major topics are listed below..Materials of reinforced concrete.Design loading and design code .Design of beam for bending and shear .Development, Splices, and Bar Cutoffs.Analysis and design of column .Design of slab .Design of foundation

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。二技三年級實施普通班體育正課教學。
description.en: The teaching goal is to establishing students have a Health life、Sportsmanship、Team work and Life time exercise habit.  All Freshman students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.

description.zh: 提供本校四技學生在本行以外，對其他領域的認識，以彌補其只鑽研專業課程的偏頗，訓練學生整合知識，使不致在知識爆炸的時代中迷失，促進各種專材的溝通，培養共識；培育人文素養，啟發人文關懷，使具有完整的人生觀。
description.en: This course offers a good opportunity for four-year college students in this university to have an easier access to a completely different field of knowledge, in the hope that  students can add their individual professional knowledge and broaden their minds. The students will be furnished with integrated knowledge, discovering a better way towards professional communication, developing more common sense and never losing themselves in this information-explosive age. With a solid basis on humanity and liberal ideology, they are sure to find a more complete picture of human life.

description.zh: 1.時變電磁場之介紹;2.平面電磁波;3.傳輸線之理論及應用;4.導波管與共振腔;5.天線與輻射系統。
description.en: 1.Introduction to Time-Varying Fields;2.Plane Electromagnetic Waves;3.Theory and Applications of Transmission Lines;4.Waveguides and Resonators;5.Antennas and Radiating Systems.

description.zh: 本課程在研習類比積體電路設計，其課程目的在給予學習者了解目前類比CMOS積體電路分析與設計，並強調基礎與應用知識以符合工業界的需求，課程內容可包括下列主題。1.類比設計概述2.基本MOS元件物理特性3.單級放大器4.差動放大器5.頻率響應6.雜訊分析7.回授8.運算放大器9.振盪器10.鎖相迴路
description.en: This course is concerned with the analog integrated circuit design. Its purpose is to deal with the analysis and design of analog CMOS integrated circuits, emphasizing fundamentals as well as new paradigms that students need to master in today's industry. The course covers the following topics. 1.Introduction o analog design2.Basic MOS device physics3.Single-stage amplifiers4.Differential amplifiers5.Frequency response6.Noise7.Feedback8.Operational amplifiers9.Oscillators10.Phase-locked loops

name.zh: 積體電路佈局設計實務
name.en: Integrated Circuit Layout Design and Implementation

description.zh: 本課程在訓練學生如何使用電腦輔助設計軟體來設計積體電路佈局,進而能培養學生具有設計積體電路佈局的能力,課程內容包含：1.佈局與電路的差異2.CMOS佈局的介紹3.電阻、電容的佈局介紹4.類比電路單元的佈局5.類比電路佈局的規劃6.輸入/輸出焊墊的介紹7.電感的佈局8.射頻電路的佈局9.電流鏡的佈局10.鎖相迴路的佈局11.雙級運算放大器的佈局12.交換電容分器的佈局13.低雜訊放大器的佈局14.數位類比轉換的佈局15.類比數位轉換器的佈局
description.en: This course is trained the student to use computer-aided design tools for the design of integrated circuit layout. Therefore, the student has the design capability of integratd circuit layout. The contedts of this course:1.Differences between layout and circuit 2.CMOS layout style 3.R、C layout.4.Analog cell layout 5.Analog floor plan 6.I/O pad layout issue 7.L Layout 8.RF circuit layout 9.Current mirror layout 10.PLL layout 11.Two stage OPA layout 12.Switched capacitor integrator layout 13.LNA layout 14.D/A layout 15.A/D layout

description.zh: 本課程適合一般大專行銷管理之授課。其目的在尋求優良的產品行銷管理方法，以求企業之良好利潤。本課程授課內容在使學生瞭解行銷管理之觀念，產品設計、產品運銷、促銷及訂價。相關之授課內容包括：市場區隔、市場組織、購買行為、產品開發、零售、批發、促銷、廣告及訂價程序等。
description.en: This course purpose is searching excellence marketing approach, and presents complete of the essential marketing concepts, processes, strategies, and tactics most commonly used by the marketing manager.  Students are enable understanding of the field: marketing management, planning, situations, decisions, actions and issues.

name.en: Introduction to Integration of Production Planning and Control

description.zh: 隨著自動化科技與資訊技術的日益精進，產業生產活動也結合這些相關技術，朝向自動化及電子化目標以改善企業體質，提升企業競爭力。發展自動化及電子化之同時，也該就相關知識及資訊進行整合，如此方能生產規劃與現場控制之相關活動作最好之協調。本課程之主要目標便是教導學生關於規劃與控制之相關知識，以及進行整合時所需之觀念及技術。
description.en: The manufacturing system becomes more complex due to the more competitive situation occurring in the marketplace. In order to survive，the enterprise must combine the automation technology and information technology to improve the manufacturing activities for fulfilling the need of production. Therefore，the aim of this course is to teach the concept and technology for integrating production planning and shop floor control.

description.zh: 介紹會計學之基本觀念， 會計循環 - 包括分錄、過帳、試算、結算及財務報表之編製。逐一說明財務報表各個項目，最後並介紹財務報表之分析。修畢本課程之後能瞭解會計學之基本原理，會計資料處理及財務報表產生之整個過程，以及簡單之財務報表分析技術，並為未來之企業及財務相關課程打下良好基礎。
description.en: This course introduces the basic concepts of accounting.  All the necessary processes are included as well the financial report analysis.  After being taking this course, the student can understand the accounting concepts, accounting data process, generation of accounting report and techniques for analyzing the financial report.

description.zh: 本課程在二技為2學分。本課程內容為：零災害、指認呼喚、預知危險、衛生防護具及儀器之保養檢查及使用、職業災害之調查與處理、特殊器械的使用、工作環境認知－通風、採光、噪音、缺氧、輻射。
description.en: The course includes zero disaster, recognition calling, danger pre-recognition, sanitation protection facilities and their maintenance, survey and arrangement of vocational danger, use of special facilities, and recognition of working environment, e.g. brightness, radiation and noise.

description.zh: 本課程之目的為使學生瞭解生產計畫與管制的基本概念，訓練學生對於生產計畫與管制的各項方法，制度設計及改善等具有基本認識，並應用管理科學及作業研究於生產計畫與管制之研究發展。本課程包括下列主題：生產計畫與管制概論、產品設計與發展、預測、來源需求規畫、生產排程、總排程、存貨管理、豐田式管理、專案規畫與管理等。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to introduce the fundamental concepts of production planning and control.  In addition, applications of management science and operations research in production control and planning are also provided.  This course is consisted of the following subjects: introduction, product design and development, forecasting, resources requirement planning, production scheduling, total scheduling, inventory management, Toyota management, and project management.

description.zh: 本課程是依大學課程標準訂定，適合於二技及四技學生修習有關工程投資分析與相關問題之探討。本課程之目的在尋找能使工程投資之獲利或報酬最佳化的相關方法，並介紹學生瞭解工程投資方案之本質；如何做預算分配，使得投資得到最佳報酬；工程投資環境；及投資方案之分析法。本課程包括下列主題：利率因素及通貨膨脹、稅率及匯兌之效應、資金預算分配問題、不確定性及風險性、投資方案之各種層面分析：生產、經濟、管理、環保及政治等方面。
description.en: The objective of this course is to examine the engineering investment decision problems. The subjects includes: the investment environment, investment project evaluation, interest rate and inflation rate, tax and exchange rate, capital budgeting, uncertainty and risk, investment projects and its relationships with production, economics, management, environment, and politics.

description.zh: 本課程在使學生瞭解生產的物品或提供的服務能適時適地，並以最少的成本送到顧客手中。本課程之內容如下：  1.物流管理和策略  2.運輸和配送  3.保管與包裝  4.定單處理  5.採        購  6.物料搬運  7.物流成本  8.物流服務  9.資訊系統10.物流生產力衡量
description.en: The aim of the course is to help the students understand how to perform logistics activities so as to make products and services available to customers at the time place,and in the condition and from desired in the most profitable or cost-effective way.The content of the course discription:  1.Transpor totion  2.Inventory maintenance  3.Order processing   4.Purchasing   5.Warehousing & packaging  6.Materials handling  7.Logistics costs  8.Logistics customer serrice  9.productivity meajurement

description.zh: 本課程在幫助此課程學習者能夠應用孼費的軟體和網路服務，製作一個基本的商業網站， 以推廣公司業務。
description.en: This course will teach the students tolearn how to built up a commercial website .

description.zh: 本課程在二技為品質管理。使學生瞭解品質管理的觀念、原理、領域。品管部門的組織、功能，如何管理產品或服務的品質，品管的工具、方法，如何持續改善品質的方法，品質表示法，如何評估品質管理成效，相關法令，品質管理未來趨勢。
description.en: This course lets the students understand the concepts, theories, and areas of qualify control, organization and functions of quality department.  Besides, the way to manage the products or the service quality, tools and methods of quality control, the way to improve the quality, quality representation method, evaluation of quality control, related regulations and future trends are also included.

description.zh: 本課程分三年（六學期）教授，各學年課程教授內容如下：第一學年----主要在教導學生對美學基本素養、空間的體驗及空間構成演練，使具備建築設計之基本能力與知識，其主要授課要點如下：一.基本設計訓練及空間的體驗：1.設計基本原理的認識與操作。2.空間經驗的掌握與表達。二、空間的構成：1.基本元素的應用--線、版、體。2.比例、尺度、材質與構造的訓練。3.開口及光影的表現。4.空間的界定與串連。三、空間與造型：1.空間與造型的關係。2.量體與空間、造型。3.結構概念與空間、造型。四、機能與組織：1.行為模式分析。2.機能與動線安排。3.空間的組織。第二學年----主要在教導學生探討空間組織、造型與行為模式等使學生具備整合建築設計相關知識及操作之能力，其主要授課要點如下：1.在範圍上--以各種使用性質的單棟建築為主題。2.在設計內容上--進一步探討空間組織、造型、行為特性及模式。3.在實質因素上--訓練對基地實質環境的認識及掌握，並著重材料、構造、設備、結構等系統的結合。4.在實務人才的養成上--具備整合建築設計相關專業知識及操作的能力。第三學年----主要在教導學生對環境或都市之認知，並使其具備細部設計以至整體建築設計及監造之能力，以銜接未來之實
description.en: This course is organized, as a three-year's program that is arranged around a pattern of six semesters. The modular teaching structure is:1. First year - An introduction to basic design problem solving : concepts of point, line, plane, and space organization : principles of unity/variety ,order ,balance , proportion ,scale , etc.; orthographic projection and axonometrics ; pattern diagramming ; and basic design consequences of human activity. Studio introduction to architectural design problem solving; concepts of architectural aesthetic principles; value drawing techniques; model building; anthropometrics ; and human gathering and circulation patterns. Investigations of visual structures and their order , and exercises to develop ability to communicate about form and space. Explorations of two-dimensional and three-dimensional design through manipulation of the design elements in association with the design principles. Emphasis on materials , techniques , and color/shape relationshi

description.zh: 本課程主要在講解建築物外部空間的營造方法，內容包括理論及實際案例的說明。授課主題涵蓋：1.敷地計畫之相關理論、2.敷地計畫之內容及程序、3.基地調查及分析、4.規劃方法與計畫評估（包括土地使用、外部空間、交通動線、排水、整地、植栽）、5.環境影響評估、6.案例分析。
description.en: This course introduces the theories, principles, and methods of designing and construction of outdoor spaces. Through cases studies, the courses seeks to expand the students understanding to the major components of site planning.Topics focus on six premises:1.	theories in relation to site planning;2.	design sequences of site planning;3.	investigations and analyses of the sites;4.	planning and designing methods and their evaluations;5.	environmental impact assessment;6.	cases studies

description.zh: 待補充
description.en: In this course student can understand the property of general material of buildingand the principles of building construction, we stress those knowledge related with component composition, that student can used in their design work.

name.en: Introduction to History of Modern Architecture

description.zh: 待修正；本課程大致依下列階段進行：1.基本歷史背景介紹及特有名詞介紹、2.現代建築的盟芽期1850-1900、3.現代建築成長期1900-1920、4.現代建築黃金期1920-1930、5.二次大戰前現代建築概況回顧。
本課程以討論建築物有關的熱、通風、換氣、光、聲音等之物理問題。授課內容分為三大部分：第一部分關係室內氣候者如通風、換氣、隔熱等之方法以創造快適之室內氣候。第二部分與光學有關之日光照射、日光輻射、自然光之採集、人工光之應用。第三部分則為與聲音有關之室內音響狀態之改善及噪音之隔斷等。
本課程主要在導引學生經由傳統的繪圖觀念及技術，進入電腦繪圖的領域。訓練學生藉著繪圖軟體的功能，應用於建築設計與其他相關課程。教學內容以講授 AutoCAD指令及應用於建築基本繪圖的練習，以二度空間繪圖指令為主。
description.en: The course objective is to train students understanding and fully employing the emerging technology of computer graphics in the architectural design process.

description.zh: 前言: 本課程主要為介紹現今主要名家與重要學派之設計理念與其實踐狀況，授課採講演與研討方式進行。內容: 瞭解設計相關理論與方法。 瞭解設計之方法與課題。 瞭解設計研究之寫作與閱讀方法。 方式: 由授課老師依不同時期，介紹所屬領域之理論、方法及參考文獻。授課方式，採講義、討論、參觀及邀請演講等方式綜合進行。為
description.en: he content of this course is to introduce the design philosophy and implementing skills of contemporary noted architects and major schools. This course will be carried on by lecturing and seminar.

description.zh: 課程主要透過電腦圖形的表現及動畫的介紹來深入探討它們在建築上的應用,尤其是在"虛擬"及"實境"領域。利用現有之應用軟體,如AutoCAD及3DS,學生將從模型的基本建立、表現及動畫到影像的輸出或者結合多媒體應用等相關之技術。課程內容部份將會傳授並調查如何經由新的媒介來傳達我們在建築空間的認知與成果。
description.en: This course will focus on advanced technologies in the production and presentation of computer-based rendering and animation and their particular uses in relationship to architecture, both "real" and "virtual." Using 3DVIZ, students will model, render, and animate projects for output to video or for use in multimedia presentations. Readings will investigate how new media transform our perception and production of architectural space. Computer Visualization or a thorough knowledge of the fundamentals of computer modeling is prerequisites.

description.zh: 1.建築表現之功能與意義。 2. 比例與明暗之訓練。3.鉛筆、色鉛筆、水彩、麥克筆、噴筆之基本技巧。4.各種圖面之表達。5.圖面安排設計。 6.表現法與設計意念。
description.en: 1. The methodology of Architecture presentation. 2. Proportion and contrast. 3. Basic technique of pencil, color pencil, watercolor, speedy colors and Airbrush Rendering. 4. The application on all kind of architecture drawing. 5. The Presentational Planning. 6. The Presentation of the design image.

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹施工圖用途及施工法，說明標準施工圖之畫法及標示說明，使學生了解建築工程各種施工法，施工次序及土地管理，加強圖面，作業與實際施工之配合。主要授課內容如下：一、施工圖標準標示法介紹、二、實際建築案例設計並繪製全套施工圖，以及各式施工大、樣圖解說、三、工地參觀、四、工作進度表演練。
description.en: 1. Graphic standards for working drawing. 2. Drawing preparation and process. 3. Selected shop drawing.

notes: 需修過建築圖學及格，限制30人。

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。二技三年級實施普通班體育正課教學。
description.en: The teaching goal is to establishing students have a Health life、Sportsmanship、Team work and Life time exercise habit.  All Freshman students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.

description.zh: 提供本校四技學生在本行以外，對其他領域的認識，以彌補其只鑽研專業課程的偏頗，訓練學生整合知識，使不致在知識爆炸的時代中迷失，促進各種專材的溝通，培養共識；培育人文素養，啟發人文關懷，使具有完整的人生觀。
description.en: This course offers a good opportunity for four-year college students in this university to have an easier access to a completely different field of knowledge, in the hope that  students can add their individual professional knowledge and broaden their minds. The students will be furnished with integrated knowledge, discovering a better way towards professional communication, developing more common sense and never losing themselves in this information-explosive age. With a solid basis on humanity and liberal ideology, they are sure to find a more complete picture of human life.

description.zh: 本課程適合一般大專行銷管理之授課。其目的在尋求優良的產品行銷管理方法，以求企業之良好利潤。本課程授課內容在使學生瞭解行銷管理之觀念，產品設計、產品運銷、促銷及訂價。相關之授課內容包括：市場區隔、市場組織、購買行為、產品開發、零售、批發、促銷、廣告及訂價程序等。
description.en: The marketing course is suitable to college student. The purpose is to find good method of product marketing, in order to pursuit good profit of enterprise. The course contents' goal makes student understand the idea of marketing, product design, product transportation, promotion and price setting. The related course includes: market segmentation, market organization, the behavior of buying, product development, retailing, whole-saling promotion, advertising and price setting process.

description.zh: 本課程以提供二技及四技學生標準訂定有關各類問題解答法。本課程之目的在尋求以數量模式求出相關作業問題之最佳解，並介紹學生瞭解作業研究的本質，數量規畫方法及機率型態問題等。本課程包括下列主題：線型規畫、網路分析、動態規畫、遊戲理論、整數規畫、非線型規畫、馬可夫鏈、等候線理論、存貨理論、預測、馬可夫決策過程、可靠度、決策分析及系統模擬等。
description.en: The course makes college student to have the ability of solving related problems. The purpose of this course is using quantity model to find the optimal solution of related operation problems and introduce the entity of operation research to student. This course includes following topics: linear programming, network analysis, dynamic programming, game theory, integer theory, non-linear programming, markevo chain,, wait-linear theory, inventory theory programming, markevo decision process , reliability, decision analysis and system simulation and so on.

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹組織內個人之行為以及團體間之種種管理；課程之內容大綱如下：組織行為之功能、組織行為之基礎－個人部份、組織行為之核心、組織動力學、組織行為之過程與結構。
description.en: This course introduces individual behavior in an organization and the management among the organizations. The course is consisted of functions of the organizational behavior (OB), fundamental of OB for individual, core of (OB), and processes and structure of (OB).

description.zh: 本課程目的在培養學生有關產經的理論基礎，一開始將對產經學門的分析架構與演變做一介紹，之後則對各項分析理論進行解說。理論方面將包括廠商理論、獨占廠商理論、寡占廠商理論等。對於理論的應用上則使用個案研討的方式。
description.en: The industrial economics is concerned with how productive activities are brought into harmony with the demand for goods and services through some organizing mechanism.  In additions, this course will also teach the students how variations and imperfections in the organizing mechanism affect the success achieved in satisfying an economy's wants.

description.zh: 本課程藉由理論說明與實例探討，讓同學能夠了解理財規劃的運作及財富管理現況，並引導同學應用所學專業來分析財經時事，以提升個人理財規劃效能，養成對趨勢、產業發展及投資判斷的智慧，本課程並安排實務業之專業人士，針對相關課程主題做深入介紹及實務經驗分享。
description.en: This course aims to provide a solid foundation which is essential for creating and managing an investment portfolio for individual clients. It focuses on the practical application of portfolio management and asset allocation processes in the context of wealth management for individual investors. With an introduction to the fundamental principles and the financial planning process, this course emphasizes on the provision of investment advisory services. It discusses client expectations and concerns including risk and other cognitive issues before applying the concepts and techniques to construct and manage investment portfolios for the client.In addition, this course incorporates other wealth management issues including consumption planning, asset acquisition and retirement planning in designing a financial plan.

description.zh: 本課程將邀請專家學者以專題演講方式，介紹電力工程、電力電子工程之最新科技與應用。研究生亦被安排報告其研究計畫與進度。參與者透過密集討論、書面報告、及舉行口頭發表等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的認識。
description.en: This course will introduce the latest technologies and applications to the power and power electronics engineering. Speakers are the Well-known scholars and specialists. Graduate students will also be arranged to report their graduate studies. The participants are encouraged to have intensive discussion, written reports, and further oral presentation. Efficient opinion exchange would be also expected to derive more extensive interest.

description.zh: 本研究討論課程之目的在使研究生學習控制工程、通訊工程、計算機工程之最新科技。受邀演講之著名專家學者透過廣泛的討論分享其研究結果與經驗，選修此課程之研究生亦須就其研究主題進行正式報告。
description.en: The seminar course is designed for graduate students to learn the latest technologies in the areas of control, communications and computer engineering. Renowned researchers and scholoars are invited to share their research results and experience through extensive discussion. Furthermore, all students in this course are required to make formal presentations on their specialized topics.

description.zh: 讓學生對於模糊邏輯、模糊推論有一整體性了解，並對於將模糊邏輯在控制工程之應用具有理論與軟體撰寫之能力。
description.en: 1. To familiarize students with fuzzy logic and fuzzy inference. 2. To familiarize students with designing controllers based on fuzzy inference. 3. To familiarize students with system modeling through fuzzy rules.

description.zh: 1. GPS 的緣起與發展2. GPS 的系統架構3. GPS 的時間與座標4. GPS 的定位原理與觀測量5. GPS 的誤差分析6. GPS 導航定位分法7. GPS 在測量的應用GPS 導航定位實習
description.en: 1. The origin and development of GPS.2. The structure of GPS.3. GPS time and coordination.4. GPS positioning principle and measurements.5. GPS error analysis.6. GPS in navigation.7. GPS in measurement.  8.GPS practice

description.zh: RF 系統簡介、RF設計概念、傳輸線分析、史密斯圖、調變與偵測、多工汲取技術、無線傳輸標準、發射器架構、RF濾波器設計、RF主動元件與模型、匹配與偏壓網路、低雜訊放大器與混波器、震盪器、頻率合成器與RF電源放大器設計等。
description.en: English Description General Induction，Basic Concepts in RF Design，Transmission Line Analysis，The Smith Chart，Modulation and Detection，Multiple Access Techniques and wireless Standards，Transceiver Architectures，An Overview of RF Filter Design，Active RF Components，Active RF component Modeling，Matching and Biasing Networks，Low-noise Amplifier and Mixers，Oscillators，Frequency Synthesizers，Power Amplifiers。

description.zh: 1.Core 的特性分析2.Choke 設計3.高頻變壓器設計4.Core 的特性實習5.Choke 實習6.高頻變壓器實習
description.en: 1.Analysis of core2.Design of choke3.High frequency transformer design4.Practice of core,choke and high frequency transformer

description.zh: 1. Matlab/Simulink簡介2. 控制系統建模3. 線性時變控制系統分析4. 可觀測性與可控制性5. 李亞普若夫穩定度分析6. 曲線擬合與系統建模7. 控制器設計8. 數值範例演練
description.en: 1. Introduction to Matlab/Simulink2. Modeling of Control Systems3. Analysis of Linear Time-Varying Control Systems4. Observability and Controllability5. Lyapunov Stability Analysis6. Curve Fitting and System Modeling7. Controller Design8. Numerical Examples

description.zh: 現代能源工程技術，決定製程成本，故如何統合有效率的能源管理技術是決定產品競爭力的關鍵，本課程主要內容為：    1.能源成本控制    2.區域型電力能管理策略    3.能源系統的經濟性設計概念    4.冷暖系統的檢測與分析    5.總合能源操作的工程化資料收集    6.新能源系統的生態模組化設計
description.en: At the completion of this course, students will be able to.1.Compare and contrast the various forms of energy eonversion.2.Examine the techmologies used to convert chemical energy into mechanical energy.3.Apply the concepts of electrical converters.4.Evaluate the major types of energy storage.5.Deformine how human values affect the success of energy conservation.6.Analyze the methods in which energy can be conserved with in the various energy sectors of society.

description.en: This course is introduced the principle of Radio Frequency IC Design such that the students have the ability of Radio Frequency IC design. The contents of this course are1、CHARACTERISITICS OF PASSIVE IC COMPONENTS2、A REVIEW OF MOS DEVICE PHYSICS3、PASSIVE RLC NETWORKS4、DISTRIBUTED SYSTEMS5、THE SMITH CHART AND S-PARAMETERS6、BANDWIDTH ESTIMATION TECHNIQUES7、HIGH-FREQUENCY AMPLIFIER DESIG8、VOLTAGE REFERENCES AND BIASING9、NOISE ANALYSIS10、LNA DESIGN11、MIXERS12、RF POWER AMPLIFIERS13、FEEDBACK SYSTEMS14、PHASE-LOCKED LOOPS15、OSCILLATORS AND SYNTHESIZERS16、ARCHITECTURES

name.en: Internet of Things and Sensor Networks

description.zh: (1)物聯網概述，(2)物聯網感知層，(3)物聯網網路層，(4)物聯網應用層，(5)物聯網平台與雲端運算，(6)無線感測網路802.15.4與ZigBee，(7)無線感測網路應用，(8) RFID原理與應用，(9) WSNs至IoT，(10)近期發展與研究議題。
description.en: (1) Introduction to the Internet of Things (IoT), (2) IoT: Perception Layer, (3) IoT: Network Layer, (4) IoT: Application Layer, (5) IoT Platform and Could Computing, (6) Wireless Sensor Networks (WSNs): 802.15.4 and ZigBee, (7) WSN Applications, (8) Principles and Applications of RFID, (9) WSNs to IoT, (10) Recent Advances and Related Research Issues.

description.zh: 讀書報告、專題討論、機電系統產品介紹與討論、Seminar心得等。可重覆修習。
description.en: Case Study, Mechatronics in Industry, Seminars.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。包括Wavelet轉換、變分法及積分方程等工程分析之技術，且以Matlab軟體來應用至影像處理、噪音振動、最佳控制、偏微分方程等工程應用實例。.
description.en: Including Wavelet transform, Variation principle, and integral equation Engineering Analysis technology, try to use Matlab software apply to Image processing, denoise, optimal control, and solving partial differential equations.

description.zh: 先修課程：電子軟體系統或相當之課程數位訊號處理簡介，DSP架構與控制器硬體簡介，計時器、輸入捕捉、輸出比較，波寬調變，類比訊號轉換週邊功能與通訊架構介紹，DSP訊號處理與控制應用。
description.en: Introduction to Digital Signal Processors, DSP architecture and integration with microcontroller, applications of DSP peripherals and communication protocols, applications of DSP to control and signal processes.

description.zh: (1)訓練學生找資料、選讀重要文獻、報告閱讀心得、互相討論之能力(2)學生經由報告、聽講、及討論,以獲得智識、工程經驗、以研究心得。
description.en: discussion of earth engineer1.to train student's capacity in finding information,   reading important paper, reporting what has learned and   discussing together.2.Students will get knowledge, engineering experiment by   reporting, listening and discussing.

name.zh: 建築施工災害與應變措施
name.en: Foundution Construction Disaster and Remedial Measures

description.zh: 基礎開挖施工作業的災害最主要的是擋土牆的傾倒,這是源自於隆起、砂湧及管湧的現象。開挖區的土壤為砂土,如果擋土牆漏水,由於淘空所形成的管湧,會導致鄰房的損壞;由於擋土牆貫入深度的不足以及點井措施的不良,會造成開挖區的砂源,最終導致擋土牆的傾倒。開挖區的土壤如果為粘土,而且粘土含水量大於液限,則開挖區的粘土產生塑性液,使支撐系統挫屈破壞,最後造成擋土牆的破壞。這些原理皆為課程的內容。此外,當基礎施工災害的機制了解之後,再講授如果發現災害的徵兆,如何採取必要的緊急應變措施, 使災害消失於無形,這些應變措施分別按照技術及行政層面來敘述。
description.en: 英文名稱:Foundution Construction Disaster and Remedial Measures  The hazand during foundation excavation is retaining wall failure, this may be caused by heaving、boiling and piping。If excavation is conducted in granular soil in which retaining wall is found leaking, the migration of silty soil will trigger piping and eventually wall failure。 If excave embedded depth of retaining wall and point walls are insufficient, this can cause boiling and lead to wall failure。 If encavation is in cohesive soil and water content is higher than liquid limit, plastic flow will lead to huckling of bracing system and to the wall failure。 After the various failure mechanisms are explained, how to identify the symptoms and how to take urgent remedial measures both technology and administration are explained accordingly。

description.zh: 專題報告，專題演講，研究小組討論Case Study, Seminar
description.en: Case Study, Seminar

description.zh: 一維及多維穩定態熱傳導及非穩定態熱傳導、對流原理、強迫對流及自然對流經驗和實驗關係式、輻射熱傳遞、凝結與沸騰、熱交換器、熱傳遞中的特殊論題
description.en: Steady-State Conduction-One Dimension, Steady-State Conduction-Multiple Dimensions, Unsteady-State Conduction, Principles of Convection, Empirical and Practical Relations for Forced-Convection Heat Transfer, Natural- Convection Systems, Radiation Heat Transfer, Condensation and Boiling Heat Transfer, Heat Exchangers, Special Topics in Heat Transfer.

description.zh: 本課程從車輛的發展史出發，介紹車輛從性能的追求、低公害污染、省能源化、輕量化和環保政策等，到當今世界能源石化燃料危機以及原物料的短缺所衍生的問題，使未來車輛的研究發展條件更趨嚴苛。本內容讓學生了解在未來的車輛發展變遷下其所應具備的基本知識。
description.en: This course introduces the history of the vehicle development. This course contains numerous subjects as follow: vehicle performance, low pollutants, energy economy, light weight, environmental policy, etc. Students will understand the basic knowledge of the future vehicle development.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹化學儲能裝置和儲冷系統之基礎與實務。課程內容包括：(一)儲能裝置理論與技術：電池儲能系統與模組、轉換器，各式燃料電池，如燐酸電池，質子交換電池等。(二)儲冷系統理論與技術：儲冰水式系統，各式儲冰系統如全凍結式、冰盤管式、冰泥式、動態製冰式、優態鹽及冰球式等。
description.en: This course including two parts:electrochemical energy storage/conversion theory and technology, and thermal storage system fundamental and technology:Electric cell engergy conversion system and module, transformer and fuel cells such as phosphatic cell and proton-exchanging chilled water systemand ice storage systems such as total freeze-up, ice-on-coil,ice slurry, dynamic ice builder, eutectic salt and ice ball systechnology will also be covered.  The advanced PCM for thermal storage will be investigated as a hint to the students.

description.zh: 系統功能分析，空調系統設計概要，負荷計算理論，送風與風管系統分析，送水系統分析，冷卻水塔熱質傳分析，主機系統性能分析
description.en: System function analysis, introduction to system designs of air-conditioning, theories on cooling load calculation, air moving and duct system analysis, water system analysis, heat and mass transfer in cooling towers, performance analysis of chillers

description.zh: 能源工程主要為介紹現有能源供應系統包含熱能及電能，上課的內容為包含熱流原理導論及再生能源、傳統火力電廠與汽電共生系統的系統原理介紹。
description.en: The concepts of thermal energy and electrical energy will be included in the Energy Engineering; the different energy system which will be introduced is as follows: renewable energy, traditional thermal power plant and cogeneration power system.
